item.title: Microsoft’s Xbox TV app now available on Amazon’s Fire TV Sticks
item.description:
Microsoft is launching its Xbox TV app on select Amazon Fire TV Sticks today. The app, which Microsoft first announced last month, provides access to Xbox Cloud Gaming, allowing subscribers of Xbox Game Pass Ultimate to stream a variety of Xbox titles to some Fire TV devices.

The Xbox app will initially be available only on the Fire TV 4K Max (2023) and Fire TV Stick 4K (2023) and will be identical to the same app available on Samsung’s recent TVs and monitors. All you’ll need is a compatible Fire TV Stick, a Bluetooth-enabled wireless controller, and an Xbox Game Pass Ultimate subscription to stream Xbox games.

Microsoft is working to allow Xbox Cloud Gaming to stream your entire Xbox library, and not just titles that are part of Game...

Continue reading…
item.dc:creator: Tom Warren

item.title: The Morning After: NASA’s year-long Mars simulation volunteers return to the real world - Engadget
item.description:
1. The Morning After: NASA’s year-long Mars simulation volunteers return to the real world  Engadget
  2. Volunteers who lived in a NASA-created Mars replica for over a year have emerged  NPR
  3. Crew of NASA’s earthbound simulated Mars habitat emerge after a year  The Associated Press
  4. NASA crew emerges from simulated Mars mission after more than a year in isolation  USA TODAY
  5. Volunteer Crew to Exit NASA’s Simulated Mars Habitat After 378 Days  NASA

item.title: Get the Shark Matrix Plus 2-in-1 robot vacuum and mop for $300 off during Target Circle Week
item.description: As of July 8, Target Circle members can snag a Shark Matrix Plus 2-in-1 robot vacuum and mop for just $399.99, down from $699.99.
